answers.answer: I would call and ask. Some have to fast... some don't.  I had to.
Call and ask, my dr told me I could eat,  but my mother insisted I didn't. I ended up eating some carrots and I passed. So id definitely call and make sure!!
I was allowed to eat and drink. My doc just told me no sugar
Ok thanks ladies (: i thought you always had to fast so I'm glad i asked lol
I was lost too so called my dr again and asked after the apt was set which is for tom, i was told i can eat just nothing sugary.
My doctor told me not you eat anything two hours before i go

question: So i have the test in a couple days and my dr never told me if it was okay to eat and drink before or if i shouldnt. Ive seen moms on here post about how they cant eat for so many hours but my dr never said anything. Have any of.your doctors just not told you? Lol
title: gestational diabetes test??
